races.analysis_summary: Colorado Sun brings superior form lines and maps perfectly from barrier 3. Cayman Island is the logical danger but faces a trickier draw.

selections.name: Colorado Sun
selections.reason: Just missed last start at this track. Drawn perfectly to stalk the speed and pounce. Rates highest on recent figures.

selections.name: Cayman Island (NZ)
selections.reason: Consistent performer who was only 1.5L off the winner last time. Will be running on strongly late.

selections.name: Inna Zou
selections.reason: Solid second at Nowra last start. Light weight and good draw bring her right into contention.

danger_horse.name: Divine Spark
danger_horse.reason: Previous form was good before a flat run last time. Can bounce back from the inside gate.

races.analysis_summary: Menzah One drops significantly in class from a Highway Handicap at Randwick to a Country Class 1. Despite the weight, he should be too classy.

selections.name: Menzah One
selections.reason: Massive class drop from Randwick Highway grade. Even with top weight, his ratings are superior to this field.

selections.name: Belnera
selections.reason: Broke maiden status impressively at this track last start. Maps well and retains fitness.

selections.name: Riverbend Unicorn
selections.reason: Consistent type who handles the mile well. Will be competitive for the placings.

danger_horse.name: Sabatina
danger_horse.reason: Placed at Dubbo and Orange recently. tough competitor but wide draw is a concern.

races.analysis_summary: Competitive staying contest. Sea Strike brings strong 3YO form from Melbourne metro tracks which usually stacks up well here.

selections.name: Sea Strike (GB)
selections.reason: Comes out of strong races at Flemington and Caulfield. The drop to country grade is a huge plus.

selections.name: Fox Appeal
selections.reason: Veteran stayer who was solid in the Cowra Cup. Proven at this level and distance.

selections.name: Mathrin
selections.reason: Runner-up in the Cowra Cup. Consistent mare who stays all day. Must be included.

danger_horse.name: Pride Of Jezza
danger_horse.reason: Won well at this track two starts back. Failed in city grade last time but bounces back here.

races.analysis_summary: Tassy Fox and He's Our Boy look the two to beat. Tassy Fox gets the nod with the better barrier draw.

selections.name: Tassy Fox
selections.reason: Chased hard for second here last start. Drawn the rails and should get the run of the race.

selections.name: He's Our Boy
selections.reason: Ran well for third in the same race as Tassy Fox. Barrier is the only negative.

selections.name: Jenni Divine
selections.reason: Resumed with a solid placing. Will strip fitter and can figure in the finish.

danger_horse.name: Central Otago
danger_horse.reason: First starter who has trialled well. Watch betting moves closely.

races.analysis_summary: High-quality sprint. Action King has been racing in city company and his 2nd at Warwick Farm is the best form reference.

selections.name: Action King
selections.reason: Runner-up at Warwick Farm last start. That form is superior to this field. The one to beat.

selections.name: Take The Rap
selections.reason: Resuming. Has excellent fresh stats and city ability. Major threat.

selections.name: Rumours Abound
selections.reason: Resuming off a trial win. Drawn the pole and has plenty of speed.

danger_horse.name: Big Day Out
danger_horse.reason: Honest campaigner who is always around the mark in these sprints.

races.analysis_summary: A decimated field with multiple scratches makes this tricky. Moonlight Dream is the most consistent of the survivors.

selections.name: Moonlight Dream
selections.reason: Consistent mare who just missed last start. With scratches, she finds a very winnable race.

selections.name: Freud
selections.reason: Won well two starts back. Forgive last run. Rates highly in this depleted field.

selections.name: Gustav
selections.reason: Last start winner at Tumut. Confidence is up and can go on with it.

danger_horse.name: Gobinda
danger_horse.reason: Placed at Albury last time. In the mix for exotics.

races.analysis_summary: Judith's Revenge was impressive breaking her maiden and can handle the step up. Party Boss is the main danger from the inside.

selections.name: Judith's Revenge
selections.reason: Dominant maiden winner last start. Progressive filly who looks up to this grade.

selections.name: Party Boss
selections.reason: Consistent type drawn barrier 1. Will be on speed and hard to run down.

selections.name: Just Google Me
selections.reason: Resuming. Has a good fresh record and drops into a suitable race.

danger_horse.name: Crucial Witness
danger_horse.reason: Drops in class and has the ability to surprise if she finds her best form.
